headline: Oracle Corporation (ORCL): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Oracle Corporation on LongYield’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on ORCL. Oracle Corporation’s share was trading at $193.61 as of January 14th. ORCL’s trailing and forward P/E were 38.02 and 29.67 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. headline: Bondholders Are Suing Oracle for Its AI Losses. Is There a Case to Keep Buying ORCL Stock and Waiting for AI to Pay Off?
summary: ORCL stock slid after bondholders filed a lawsuit tied to AI-related debt, but strong cloud growth and a massive backlog suggest the long-term thesis remains intact.

headline: CloudAvanti Appoints Brad Dever as Chief Commercial Officer and Managing Director
summary: CloudAvanti announced today that Brad Dever has joined the firm as Chief Commercial Officer and Managing Director, effective January 19. In this role, Dever will be responsible for leading CloudAvanti's commercial strategy, with a focus on client experience, sales execution, market expansion and strategic alliances across North America.
